rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
At the beginning of each end step, if you control no untapped lands, transform Martoob, Blessing of Water.
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever a player taps a land for mana, return that land to its owner's hand unless they pay 1 life.
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent controls no tapped lands, transform Tamaak, Drought of Life.
